DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether specific Micro-RNA expression profile related Prostate cancer outcome .
DOC.brief_title: Micro-RNA Expression Profiles High Risk Prostate Cancer
DOC.criteria: Patients clinically localise high risk prostate cancer ( cT > 2 , bx GS > 7 , PSA > 20 ng/ml ) schedule radical prostatectomy . Non high risk prostate cancer
